title: ‚ÄéForever Young Winter-Spring 2024 | Dundee Theater, a story by Film Streams ‚Ä¢ Letterboxd
text: Looking for an entertaining activity for you and your family this weekend? Join Film Streams starting Jan 13 through Mar 31 for the Forever Young Series every Saturday and Sunday at 10 AM at the Dundee Theater. Whether you're a kid at heart or want to spend quality time with the little one in your life, Forever Young's mix of beloved classics and heartwarming modern hits provides fun for everyone! And remember, tickets are only five dollars! [https://filmstreams.org/series/forever-young-winter-spring-2024](https://filmstreams.org/series/forever-young-winter-spring-2024) The Films: [HUGO (2011)](https://boxd.it/R08) dir. Martin Scorsese [THE PEBBLE AND THE PENGUIN (1995)](https://boxd.it/tLO) dir. Don Bluth and Gary Oldman [MY GIRL (1991)](https://boxd.it/24PK) dir. Howard Zieff [BABE: PIG IN THE CITY (1998)](https://boxd.it/1YEQ) dir. George Miller [WILLY WONKA & THE CHOCOLATE FACTORY (1971)](https://boxd.it/2aLu) dir. Mel Stuart [CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS (2009)](https://boxd.it/1A40) dir. Phil Lord and Christopher Miller ABOUT FOREVER YOUNG üçø Films show Saturday and Sunday mornings üéüÔ∏è Tickets just $5 for all ages [üé•](https://emojipedia.org/movie-camera) All showings located at the Dundee Theater ABOUT FILM STREAMS Film Streams is a nonprofit arts organization dedicated to enhancing the cultural environment of the Omaha-Council Bluffs area through the presentation and discussion of film as an art form. Our organization oversees two beautiful cinemas: the Ruth Sokolof Theater, in North Downtown Omaha, and the historic Dundee Theater, Omaha‚Äôs longest surviving neighborhood cinema.
